duties_responsibilities.duty: Quickly assess and prioritize incoming patients.
Perform comprehensive nursing assessments and stabilize patients.
Provide direct nursing care and supervise non-licensed nursing staff within the RN’s scope of practice and in accordance with established policies.
Provide patient education / follow-up care instructions and make necessary referrals.

education_certification.credential: Current licensure as a Registered Nurse (ASN) from Texas Board of Nurse Examiners. Compact license is accepted. BSN required within 24 months of hire into RN position.
